column5: Merry and Festive Christmas to all and a Healthy New Year  Make sure you eat your meats  If not!!!! No Pouding (Pudding  lol) FOR YOU
Looks good Marc!!! What time can we all be over???
WOW, that looks amazing. No shortage of meat in your household!
LOLâ€¦my favourite line from that Pink Floyd song!
If not!!!! No Pouding FOR YOU  Or pudding for that matter. Looks tasty Marc!!!
I know the address... but it will probably be all gone in 9 hours..
By Tomorrow Wayne  Love my meats , this time of year love using my smoker  Drifter, ya Pouding or Pudding lol  But hey Pound that meat down
That is some of the best looking smoked muskie I have seen in a while.    Art
Your making me hungry damm. What is it if you don't mind me askin?
I think the mint jelly is a hint that it is lamb!  Looks delish Marc!
All I can tell you Joey, is that it looks a lot better than the last meal I had a Marc's!  The day Dan had a terrible musky fishing accident, but no point wasting any meat! lol
